column5: She cried about forgetting it.  I had to laugh because I didnt even remember it hahahah. Just another day
You just voided something of your sport sticking out your Congrats Terry, many more.
10th Anniversary Friday. Thanks for reminding Terry.

This ever happen to you  You get up Sunday morning Looks like a great day to get out on the water you get on the water just as the sun is coming up a beautiful sun rise  Life is grand  lots of fish playing tag, only problem is the game you want to play is full contact touch tag then it happens  you realize  today is your 40th wedding anniversary and you got up and went fishing rather then spending the morning with your wife  that ever happen to you  no   me neither       till today  oops  back home and cook her breakfast
LOL....not the exact same scenario but my wife and I say happy anniversary to each other a week or 2 before the actual date as we have BOTH forgotten it before.
Been there, done that and still alive.
You're a good man Charlie Brown...
We usually go fishing for our anniversary!  S.
We usually go fishing for our anniversary!  S. I wish ....  .  Lucky you
7 years away for Debbe and I Terry....but thx for the heads up    However many birthdays and anniversaries have been missed by both of us along the way....not a really big deal around here.
Same here lol. I mark it on my phone's calendar now so I know a day in advance haha
I do not understand.  Whats the problem ?
Congrats Terry. You should have had breakfast delivered and kept fishing.
Congrats Terry. You should have had breakfast delivered and kept fishing.  Exactly.
Yes and no....she usually out fishes me LOL  S.
lol yeah  maybe on  the 39th one but the 10's like 30 and 40  seem to be important to her
lol yeah  maybe on  the 39th one but the 10's like 30 and 40  seem to be important to her   Well lucky me. I got 7 years of no worries. LOL
Good job on realizing and get back before S hit the fan, lol!
Loved the stories of her on LOTWs lodge slaying off the dock!

You've got brass ones pal!  If I so much as looked at fishing pole on my anniversary my head would be on a pike.  Mind you, it's a small price to pay for all the other fishing nonsense she puts up with, and my anniversary is in the winter.
If I came back with fish, no problem!! If not, a BIG prob!
LMAO..
I can almost see the oh crap look on your face and the full throttle ride back to the dock lol
Thanks for the reminder, ours is the 15th and she has a birthday on the 13th, the big six OOOOOOO. She don't read here, I hope

Can't say I have ever done that. But I did make a breakfast in bed for my former wife for her 30th birthday, card, gift and all. Only to find out I had the right day but wrong month, at least early not late. These birthdays, anniversaries and the like are all very over rated anyway. Invented by women for women. Kind of like the DeBeers of diamond fame coming up with this diamond engagement ring deal to sell more diamonds, what a scam, and we buy into it.
Well Terry, that's something of yours that you haven't broke! Congratulations to you both and I wish you another 40 years of un-broken happiness! HH

Can't say I have ever done that. But I did make a breakfast in bed for my former wife for her 30th birthday, card, gift and all. Only to find out I had the right day but wrong month, at least early not late. These birthdays, anniversaries and the like are all very over rated anyway. Invented by women for women. Kind of like the DeBeers of diamond fame coming up with this diamond engagement ring deal to sell more diamonds, what a scam, and we buy into it.   See, HE, gets it.  Just another day.  LMAO  They say, for better or worse. Sickness and health, golfing or fishing,,,,,,,,   I DO  LOL

We'll be married 51 years next month and I can honestly say I've never forgotten our anniversary, I did however forget Valentines Day one time and that was pretty near as bad as forgetting an anniversary LOL
